Self-Sanitizing Toothbrush: A toothbrush that can clean itself after each use, eliminating the need for frequent replacement bristles and reducing the risk of bacteria buildup.
Toothbrush with Built-In Dental Floss: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in floss dispenser, making it easier to floss daily and improve overall oral health.
Toothbrush with Sensor Technology: A toothbrush that uses sensors to detect areas of your mouth that need more attention, providing a more thorough cleaning experience.
Toothbrush with Pressure Sensors: A toothbrush that uses pressure sensors to monitor your brushing technique and provide feedback on how to improve your pressure and angle for optimal cleaning.
Toothbrush with a Built-In Timer: A toothbrush that comes with a built-in timer, ensuring that you brush for the recommended two minutes each day and providing a consistent brushing routine.
